summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs Acquisition Reform Act of 2025 aims to overhaul the VA's acquisition, procurement, logistics, leasing, and construction processes. The bill seeks to consolidate construction and leasing activities under the Director of Construction and Facilities Management and acquisition, procurement, and logistics under the Chief Acquisition Officer. It also mandates a regional organizational structure for these functions. Furthermore, the bill prioritizes acquisition internship programs for entry-level positions and requires reports to Congress on workforce improvements and consolidation activities.
